body:
### Description:

A malformed request to `MultiSites`.`getEvolutionGraph` having an unexpected value for `colors` might currently end up in an error.

Discarding non array values should solve that.

Example request that fails: `index.php?module=MultiSites&action=getEvolutionGraph&period=day&date=2024-06-04%2C2024-07-03&evolutionBy=nb_visits&columns=nb_visits&idSite=3&idsite=3&viewDataTable=sparkline&colors="test"`
